price: គឺបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលប្រតិបត្ដិសឡាត និងបរិច្ចាគអំពីអ្វីដែល យើងបានផ្ដល់ឱ្យពួកគេ។
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
